Enumeration Type Documentation

enum conflate_log_level

Log levels.

Enumerator:
DEBUG 

Various debug messages (for example xmpp stanzas).

INFO 

Info messages that might be helpful.

WARN 

Warnings of stuff going bad.

ERROR 

Noteworthy error conditions.

FATAL 

The rapture is upon us.

Function Documentation

void conflate_stderr_logger ( void *  ,
enum  conflate_log_level,
const char *  ,
  ... 
)

Logging implementation that logs to stderr.

The stderr logger is somewhat primitive in that it does not have any sort of level filter, but useful for running apps on console with verbosity.

Examples:
examples/bot.c.

const char *  ,

)

Logging implementation that logs to syslog.

This is the default logger.
